name: procomm-app
description: ProComm Video Conference Application - React + Node.js

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run peer"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
